item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

12/31/2012's location will be:
Kelly's Restaurant and Bar

Kelly's is an Irish pub located near the corner of Crown and Temple under the Kelly House apartments.  They have some nice Irish wood work at the bar and a fireplace decor in the dinning room.  The menu features a mix of a few old Irish favorites and more common American fare.

Start off your New Years Eve with the NHC!  Since happy hour is at 6, you can certainly stay at Kellys or there will be plenty of time later to get home or make it to another party.

Specials:

The generous Owners and Managers, Patrick and Jeanie, will put out a selection of Appetizers for our enjoyment.

There will also be a few beers and wines selected for discount that day, and possibly a special cocktail.

Please RSVP for this event to give Kelly's an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

AJ will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

For more information about the Pub:
www.kellysnewhaven.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / contact your Listed Host from the Event Description. (In this case A.J. 315-345-9348)
item.name: Happy Hour (12/31) - Kelly's Restaurant and Bar
